name: codelens-ai
description: AI-powered code explanations on hover. Hover over any line or code block to see what it does, why it exists, and how it connects to surrounding code.

codelensAI.provider.description: AI provider to use for code explanations.

codelensAI.apiKey.description: API key for the selected provider (not used for Ollama).

codelensAI.apiBase.patternErrorMessage: Must start with http:// or https://
codelensAI.apiBase.description: Base URL for the API (e.g. https://api.zhihuiai.top/v1). Leave empty to use the provider's default endpoint.

codelensAI.model.description: Model name to use for explanations.

codelensAI.highlightColor.description: Background color for the hover-highlighted code block (e.g. "rgba(0, 128, 128, 0.2)"). Leave empty to use theme-aware defaults (dark: teal 15%, light: teal 25%, high-contrast: white 10%).
